mapper.select: select * from post_info where CONCAT(IFNULL(post_info.`post_title`,''),IFNULL(post_info.`post_content`,'')) LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or user_id in (select user_id from user_info where user_name like '%' #{keyword} '%') or post_id in (select post_id from tag_link where tag_id in (select tag_id from tag_info where tag_content like '%' #{keyword} '%')) order by update_time desc,post_id desc limit ${(offset-1)*size},${size}

select * from doc_info where doc_name LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or user_id in (select user_id from user_info where user_name like '%' #{keyword} '%') or doc_id in (select doc_id from tag_link where tag_id in (select tag_id from tag_info where tag_content like '%' #{keyword} '%')) order by download_num desc,doc_id desc limit ${(offset-1)*size},${size}
